articles.title: Russisches Gericht lehnt Berufung von US-Basketballerin ab
articles.image_title: DIESES FOTO WIRD VON DER RUSSISCHEN STAATSAGENTUR TASS ZUR VERFÜGUNG GESTELLT. [RUSSIA, KRASNOGORSK - OCTOBER 25, 2022: US basketball player Brittney Griner appeals her sentence via a video linkup from a detention centre at the Moscow Regional Court. Being charged with drug smuggling, Griner was sentenced to nine years in prison and a fine of one million rubles on August 4, 2022. Vyacheslav Prokofyev/TASS]
